title: HOUR 1 - Patrick Mahomes Picks Legacy over Money, Cowboys are Al Davis’ Raiders
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Patrick Mahomes Picks Legacy over Money, Cowboys are Al Davis’ Raiders
description:
Today on The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin discusses how star athletes who've had successful careers approach their craft with winning attitudes and Patrick Mahomes understands that continuity behind winning. Jerry Jones and the Cowboys are beginning to remind Colin of Al Davis’ Raiders in the way the organization aged and got weirder towards the end. Plus, College Football is around the corner and Colin shares his thoughts on the AP Top 25.

 

Guest: FOX Sports CFB Analyst Joel Klatt

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
